attributes.comment:
I strongly oppose the increase in the fee schedule. I am adopting Internationally
from China and I already have my I-600 approval (I-171H) but due to the increasing
referral times I expect that approval to expire. I have petitioned your agency to
extend the approval time on the approval multiple times and now I find that you are
desire to raise the rates for re-application! It is already an unexpectedly large
financial hardship to re-complete my entire Home Study and other necessary
documentation to just re-apply for the approval. Now you are proposing to increase
the fee again, which will continue to add to the financial hardship.
I have heard your agencies statements for not extending the approval timelines as
in the best welfare interest of the adoptive children and I can see SOME validity to
that statement, but to then go and increase the fee just as a large number of
families will be required to re-apply is WRONG! I strongly urge you to reconsider
this proposal. I also STRONGLY implore you to establish a REDUCED fee
structure for those of us having to re-apply due the arbitary expiration date of our
first approval. Better yet..... PLEASE JUST EXTEND OUR APPROVALS!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Pamela A. Jay
